titlestmt.titleproper: Guide to the Lonesome Dove Production Records
titlestmt.author: by Alison Clemens

publicationstmt.publisher: Beinecke Rare Book and Manuscript Library

profiledesc.creation: This finding aid was produced using ArchivesSpace on Tuesday April 23, 2019 at 03:40

repository.corpname: Beinecke Rare Book and Manuscript Library

did.abstract: Production records for the 1989 Lonesome Dove television miniseries, based on Larry McMurtry's book Lonesome Dove, produced by Dyson Lovell of Motown Productions for CBS Inc., and starring Robert Duvall, Tommy Lee Jones, Danny Glover, Diane Lane, and Frederic Forrest. The records include financial and budgetary files, as well as files on the cast and crew, including headshots of prospective cast members and information on prospective directors, editors, composers, and photographers. The records also include shooting schedules, call sheets, storyboards, scripts, and production reports, as well as Dyson Lovell's production files. Post production files are also included.

accessrestrict.head: Conditions Governing Access
accessrestrict.p: The materials are open for research.

acqinfo.head: Immediate Source of Acquisition
acqinfo.p: Purchased from Royal Books on the Frederick W. and Carrie S. Beinecke Fund for Western Americana, 2015.

bioghist.head: Biographical / Historical
bioghist.p: Lonesome Dove, television miniseries, broadcast on CBS in 1989; adaptation of the novel by Larry McMurtry (New York: Simon and Schuster, 1985).

prefercite.head: Preferred Citation
prefercite.p: Lonesome Dove Production Records. Yale Collection of Western Americana, Beinecke Rare Book and Manuscript Library.

processinfo.head: Processing Information
processinfo.p: Collections are processed to a variety of levels, depending on the work necessary to make them usable, their perceived research value, the availability of staff, competing priorities, and whether or not further accruals are expected. The library attempts to provide a basic level of preservation and access for all collections, and does more extensive processing of higher priority collections as time and resources permit.

Information included in the Description of Papers note and Collection Contents section is drawn from information supplied with the collection and from an initial survey of the contents. Folder titles appearing in the contents list below are often based on those provided by the creator or previous custodian. Titles have not been verified against the contents of the folders in all cases. Otherwise, folder titles are supplied by staff during initial processing.
This finding aid may be updated periodically to account for new acquisitions to the collection and/or revisions in arrangement and description.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: Production records for the 1989 Lonesome Dove television miniseries, produced by Dyson Lovell of Motown Productions for CBS Inc. and starring Robert Duvall, Tommy Lee Jones, Danny Glover, Diane Lane, and Frederic Forrest. The records include financial and budgetary files, as well as files on the cast and crew, including headshots of prospective cast members and information on prospective directors, editors, composers, and photographers. The records also include shooting schedules, call sheets, storyboards, scripts, and production reports, as well as Dyson Lovell's production files. Post production files are also included.

userestrict.head: Conditions Governing Use
userestrict.p: The Lonesome Dove Production Records is the physical property of the Beinecke Rare Book and Manuscript Library, Yale University. Literary rights, including copyright, belong to the authors or their legal heirs and assigns. For further information, consult the appropriate curator.

arrangement.head: Arrangement
arrangement.p: Organized into five series: I. Financial, 1987-1988. II. Cast and Crew, 1987-1988. III. Set, 1987-1988. IV. Dyson Lovell, 1988. V. Post Production, 1988.

controlaccess.title: Lonesome Dove (Television program : 1989)

Western television programs
Television programs -- United States
controlaccess.occupation: Television producers and directors -- United States -- 20th Century

arrangement.head: Arrangement
arrangement.p: Series I is arranged alphabetically file name.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: Series I contains financial records of the Lonesome Dove production.

arrangement.head: Arrangement
arrangement.p: Series II is arranged alphabetically by department.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: Series II contains records on the crew and cast. Hiring and casting crew and cast members is especially well documented.

did.unittitle: Directors and artists approved by CBS

arrangement.head: Arrangement
arrangement.p: Series III is arranged in no particular order.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: Series III contains set records. Information on set locations, shooting schedules, and scripts is especially well documented.

did.unittitle: Movement lists, call sheets, and time reports
Script, part III continued and part IV

arrangement.head: Arrangement
arrangement.p: Series IV is arranged in no particular order.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: Series IV contains producer Dyson Lovell's production files and production book.

arrangement.head: Arrangement
arrangement.p: Series V is arranged in no particular order.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: Series V contains post production fies.
